snippet: Top American commanders were absent from the ceremony marking the hand-over of Bagram prison to Afghan control, and even agreement on a crucial point of the signed prison deal itself was elusive.
abstract: Top American commanders are absent from ceremony marking the full transfer of Afghan detainees and prison operations of Bagram prison in Afghanistan to Afghan control; hundreds of prisoners remain under American detention, and details of the deal remain in dispute.
lead_paragraph: Top American commanders were absent from the ceremony marking the hand-over of Bagram prison to Afghan control, and even agreement on a crucial point of the signed prison deal itself was elusive.

headline.seo: Parwan Prison Transferred to Afghans, but Questions Remain
headline.main: Issues Linger as Afghans Take Control of a Prison
headline.print_headline: Issues Linger As Afghans Take Control Of a Prison
